name: Titan
description: Represents a Titan character. Only character owner can modify fields and call functions unless otherwise specified.

instanceFields.label: RunSpeedBase
instanceFields.description: Titan's base run speed. Final run speed is RunSpeedBase + Size * RunSpeedPerLevel.

instanceFields.label: WalkSpeedBase
instanceFields.description: Titan's base walk speed. Final walk speed is WalkSpeedBase + Size * WalkSpeedPerLevel.

instanceFields.label: WalkSpeedPerLevel
instanceFields.description: Titan's walk speed added per size.

instanceFields.label: RunSpeedPerLevel
instanceFields.description: Titan's run speed added per size.

instanceFields.label: ActionPause
instanceFields.description: Titan's pause delay after performing an action.

instanceFields.label: AttackPause
instanceFields.description: Titan's pause delay after performing an attack.

instanceFields.label: TurnPause
instanceFields.description: Titan's pause delay after performing a turn.

instanceFields.label: FarAttackCooldown
instanceFields.description: (AI) Titan's cooldown after performing a ranged attack.

instanceFields.label: AttackWait
instanceFields.description: (AI) Titan's wait time between being in range and performing an attack.

instanceFields.label: CanRun
instanceFields.description: (AI) Titan can run or only walk.

instanceFields.label: UsePathfinding
instanceFields.description: Determines whether the (AI) titan uses pathfinding. (Smart Movement in titan settings)

instanceMethods.label: MoveTo
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) titan to move towards a position and stopping when within specified range. If ignoreEnemies is true, will not engage enemies along the way.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The target position to move to.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The stopping range from the target position.

parameters.name: ignoreEnemies
parameters.description: If true, will not engage enemies along the way.

instanceMethods.label: Target
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) titan to target an enemy character or MapTargetable for focusTime seconds. If focusTime is 0 it will use the default focus time

parameters.name: enemyObj
parameters.description: The enemy to target (can be Character or MapTargetable).

parameters.name: focus
parameters.description: The focus time in seconds (0 uses default focus time).

instanceMethods.label: GetTarget
instanceMethods.description: Gets the target currently focused by this character. Returns null if no target is set.

instanceMethods.label: Idle
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) titan to idle for time seconds before beginning to wander. During idle the titan will not react or move at all.

instanceMethods.label: Wander
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) titan to cancel any move commands and begin wandering randomly.

instanceMethods.label: Blind
instanceMethods.description: Causes the titan to enter the blind state.

instanceMethods.label: Cripple
instanceMethods.description: Causes the titan to enter the cripple state for time seconds. Using 0 will use the default cripple time.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The cripple duration in seconds (0 uses default time).
